feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.250.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸš€ What's New in NocoDB v0.250.1! ğŸš€

ğŸ§¹ We've cleaned the house!

This release (v0.250.1) introduces a significant cleanup of legacy code, enhancing stability and enhancing future upgrades.

âš ï¸ Important Upgrade Notice (for v0.0xx.0) âš ï¸

If you're upgrading from legacy versions (v0.0xx.0), there will be some extra steps so please follow the instructions below:

ğŸ‘‰ To ensure a smooth upgrade from legacy versions, you first need to upgrade to v0.207.3.

ğŸ”„ Why? This intermediate step is crucial because we've cleaned up legacy code in this version, which restricts direct upgrades to the latest release.

ğŸ‘‰ After successfully upgrading to v0.207.3, you can safely upgrade to v0.250.1

Following these steps will help ensure a seamless transition and optimal performance with our latest enhancements. ğŸš€âœ¨

We appreciate your attention to this process and are here to support you every step of the way!

ğŸ”— Support and Documentation:

For detailed upgrade instructions, visit our upgrade guide. Still need help? Reach out to us via community forum or discord.

Thank you for choosing NocoDB. We're thrilled to introduce these enhancements and eager to support your ongoing success!

ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Kanban - delete stack that was set as default value #8712
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: After creating the project, the entry to create the data source cannot be found #8669
  • [closed] Bug : Form submission leads to an error when submitting the shared form if the column name has a '.' (dot) character. #8654
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Mobile iOS safari - add new record not visible #8651
  • [closed] How to use/any experiences on SQLAlchemy Automap on NocoDB? / or how to disable Many-to-many relation separated table feature in NocoDB? #8650
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: "connect a data source" is missing on 0.207.3(nocodb binary version) #8636
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: count api sometimes returns 0 #8631
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: External data source options not available in 0.207 #8621
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature Request : Have the ability to separate hundreds and thousands for numeric values #8589
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Uploading JSON file results in URL values with ? to $ #8577
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Function MONTH is not available #8464
  • [ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Define data type of formula result #8341
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Freezes after 0.205.0-20240419-1802 #8318
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Kanban drag drop issue #8306
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: An â€œRecord N not foundâ€ exception throws when deleting in the grid view with groupby. #8305
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Some rows doesn't have data when draging in the bottom right corner of the cell to copy data #8235
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Unable to create data with json array by using openapi through swagger #8226
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Barcode is blank returns error #8020
  • [ğŸ¬ DB : MySQL][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: SingleLineText field silently drops part of text #7694
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Link record between Atbl Imported & local table fails #7632
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: attachment in the non-english field name causes error "Overload resolution failed" #7475
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: email verification not working #7473
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: /email/verify/:token no longer exists so users see a 404 when they try to follow the verify email link #7241
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Mention team members in comments #4257
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Resolve comments #4256
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible][ğŸŒ® Scope : Table] Adding sort to a lookup column which points to a rollup column errors out #3419

What's Changed

  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8604
  • chore: move sync action after npm release as it pushes some commits by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8608
  • chore: move sync action after npm release as it pushes some commits by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8607
  • fix: include the range fields as columns in sharedView Meta by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8599
  • fix: expanded view not working on shared view and shared bases by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8596
  • fix: Gallery View delete using expanded form by @rohittp0 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8595
  • fix: throw error if invalid operator used in xcCondition by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8568
  • nc-fix/ SingleLineText Fields silently dropping larger than length values by @rohittp0 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8437
  • Decode field name as utf-8 by @rohittp0 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8609
  • Nc docs/auth api token by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8586
  • docs: Improve environment documentation by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8618
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8617
  • docs: dev resources by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8588
  • Nc chore/slow dev by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8616
  • Nc feat/new field modal by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8578
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8623
  • Nc fix/cal shared filters by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8628
  • Add custom trigger support for Docs indexing action by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8627
  • Nc fix/shared view UI changes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8615
  • feat: display number/decimal value according to locale format by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8626
  • Nc chore/design expanded record by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8629
  • Nc fix/select type default value update issue if option is new by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8638
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8637
  • Validate pk value before query execution by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8640
  • chore(deps): bump mysql2 from 3.9.7 to 3.9.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8619
  • fix: e-mail verification endpoint path by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8645
  • Nc feat/links view filter by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8646
  • Nc fix/field modal issues by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8653
  • Nc fix: UI/UX minor fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8648
  • fix: use basesUser to show number of members by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8649
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8656
  • fix: Lookup sort related issue by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8652
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): restore changes old pr by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8660
  • fix(nc-gui): form field validation issue if column title contains . by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8657
  • Nc feat/auto generate field name based on field type by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8644
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8661
  • docs: describe NC_DISABLE_EMAIL_AUTH by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8662
  • Nc fix/misc by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8664
  • Nc fix/reordering deleting view causes it to stuck in state by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8665
  • feat: Notifications by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8622
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8671
  • chore(nc-gui): install inflection by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8675
  • feat: query isolation by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8666
  • fix: duplicate base by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8678
  • chore: remove unused code base by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8676
  • fix: use xc table for at import by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8605
  • Nc Refactor: Gallery view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8674
  • Nc fix/mobile view bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8670
  • chore: remove logs for job started/completed by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8682
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8683
  • fix(nc-gui): allow vertical resize for rich text input in form view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8684
  • fix: nested link with ag pk by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8690
  • fix: move get users list to promise by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8695
  • feat: calendar followup by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8643
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8699
  • Nc feat/type conversions rebased by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8680
  • Nc staing/issues by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8681
  • chore: cache init by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8697
  • fix: cache pipeline & source delete by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8688
  • fix: add a nuxt plugin to handle chunk error by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8701
  • fix: delete comments on model delete by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8706
  • fix: flaky tests by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8713
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8707
  • Nc fix/comments UI by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8711
  • Nc Refactor: Kanban view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8689
  • fix: comment delete not working by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8714
  • Nc fix/filter bugs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8716
  • fix: missing comment changes by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8724

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.207.3...0.250.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.250.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Misc issues #8746
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: field sorting will send two requests in weak network #8613

What's Changed

  • fix: missing conditionV2 by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8736
  • fix: Add source_id filter when getting table list by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8735
  • fix: Support FK column update(system field) in external dbs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8737
  • fix: avoid extra encode by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8739
  • Nc fix/resolve console warnings by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8715
  • Nc fix/filter bugs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8732
  • test: fix mfe toggle (trial) by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8740
  • fix: delete org user by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8742
  • fix: avoid marking updated on select by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8741
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8731
  • Type corrections and avoid duplicate filter delete request by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8744
  • fix: field sorting will send two requests in weak network by @chavyleung in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8614
  • fix: allow dragging to grid end by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8745
  • fix: ERD - avoid fetching non-source table metas by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8747
  • fix: missing pk handling by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8749
  • Update 030.expand-record.md by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8751
  • Fix: Misc bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8748
  • fix: Wait until any previous filter is saving by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8752

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.250.1...0.250.2

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: UI ACL CHANGES ARE NOT SAVED #8905
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Import CSV bug #8893
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Pop up prompt "this.xlsx.read is not a function". When I import, this content pops up. #8887
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Select user role dropdown options are broken #8881
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Calendar View via CreatedAt | UpdatedAt fields #8873
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Add real-time update and show all lines(user selects how many lines to show). #8860
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Can't set default value = 0 for "Currency" field #8848
  • [closed] [Design] ğŸ› Bug: Group BY UI follow up's #8815
  • [closed] [Design] ğŸ› Bug: expanded record UI/UX #8814
  • [closed] [Design] ğŸ› Bug: Comments modal UI/UX #8813
  • [closed] Bug : Audit records only available for super user ? #8793
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: migration file "nc_050_tenant_isolation" failed (value too long for type character varying(20)) #8773
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Comment URL, add hover effect #8769
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Expand all / Collapse all feature for group by view. #8722
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: decimal precision display #8693
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Support for use of Lookup over attachment field as cover image in Gallery & Kanban view #8677
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook delete payload is only visible columns #8667
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cell drag is not resulting in audit entries #8641
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Broken Links on https://docs.nocodb.com/fields/fields-overview/ #8611
  • [closed] ğŸ› Doc: Properly document advanced field attributes #7815
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Bases search field or filter #7417

What's Changed

  • fix: docs build by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8856
  • fix: missing storeToRefs by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8851
  • Nc fix: expanded record UI/UX by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8847
  • fix(nc-gui): default value update issue if value is 0 by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8857
  • test: fix-sort-order by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8849
  • Nc fix/lookup array value bug by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8855
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8866
  • Nc feat: improve lazy loading for field edit or add by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8846
  • Nc fix/UI bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8858
  • feat: Use lookup over attachment field as cover image in gallery & kanban view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8801
  • fix(nc-gui): calendar tooltips not showing fix(nc-gui): handle ltar by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8870
  • fix: avoid listening all events by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8864
  • fix: update roundUpToPrecision function by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8874
  • fix: substitute column ids for LTAR by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8872
  • Nc docs/link fix2 by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8876
  • refactor: show webhook tab by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8871
  • fix: add virtual scroll to pagination list by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8863
  • fix(nc-gui): update the audits design in expanded form by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8867
  • fix: avoid passing bt flag from user payload by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8877
  • Nc fix: MFE & Field modal UI/UX by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8878
  • Nc fix: Reset gallery/kanban view cover image column id on deleting column by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8869
  • Nc fix: Org user role selector dropdown issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8883
  • fix: insert user from group by by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8889
  • Nc fix/kanban flaky by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8888
  • fix: Audit records only available for super user by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8882
  • feat: export as on background by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8890
  • fix: Error: this.xlsx.read is not a function while importing xlsx file in oss by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8891
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8896
  • Nc test/flaky filters by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8894
  • fix: webhook delete & update payload by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8897
  • fix: long base_id issue by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8884
  • feat: groupby aggregation by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8838
  • fix: Import CSV/Excel/JSON bug in non selected base by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8895
  • Feat: support createdAt, updatedAt, formula for calendar by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8904
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8908
  • fix: ui acl issue by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8916

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.251.0...0.251.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Airtable import not importing the data #9032
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Unlimited record per page #9023
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook Parameters are not sent #9021
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: CSV Data Upload option not available for MySQL when Schema edit is disabled #8993
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: UI Issue with JSON Type Columns #8987
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ˜ DB : Postgres] ğŸ› Bug: Meta database configuration missing database name #8965
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: No belongs-to column for link to same table #8958
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: Portainer: getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND host.docker.internal #8945
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Modal from belongs-to chip doesn't show links #8940
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] Bug: Missing image quick switch button #8937
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: docker: invalid reference format. #8932
  • [ğŸ‘‹ For : Community or Good First Issue] ğŸ› Bug: "Rename view" should be "rename form" #8930
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: "w.replace is not a function" on CSV import #8928
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: SignIn/SignUp -- trim extra spaces if any #8910
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Audit related fixes #8868
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: The order of the columns in autoCompleteFieldList dropdown (sort, group, filter menu) should be same as view column order #8861
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Import CSV - skip field mapping during import #8796
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: After each width adjustment of nc-sidebar, when the page is refreshed, the width changes to the default width #8774
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Export all the content of a table in only one csv/xls file #8698
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: The color of scrollbar need to be more obvious. #8659
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: isFunction is not a function #8018
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Global search over date time field #7901
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Commenter/Viewer can enable columns in View but they show empty #7867
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Groupby dateTime related fields is not working properly #7494
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: field order in toolbar & linked record modal #7422
  • [ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: Gallery View Image View is broken. #7264
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: API made calls not shown in the audit log #7201
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: 'subdirectory_arrow_right' text appears before column names #6446
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: uppercase should be after lowercase when sort A-Z #5929
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: CSV import Id fields doesn't effect table Id counter #5243
  • [ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ”¬ Status: In-Analysis] Error on Start after docker-compose down, docker-compose pull, docker-compose up -d #4965

What's Changed

  • Release 0.251.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8919
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8920
  • test: UI ACL by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8927
  • chore: remove trailing space from docker command by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8936
  • chore: upgrade pnpm install action by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8934
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8935
  • fix(nc-gui): translation merge issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8938
  • maintenance ui by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8909
  • feat: Field list dropdown order should be same as view column order by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8917
  • feat: maintenance alert docs by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8944
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8939
  • fix: sync docs dependencies by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8946

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: NocoDB v0.251.2 broke attachment display (at least with Backblaze B2) #9057
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Accessing the page through the sharing link of Base, there exists the create view button under the table of the left-sidebar, but creating a new view through the create view button will get an error message: Request failed with status code 403 #9055
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: In the development environment, uploaded attachments cannot be opened #9004
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Open file in attachment in the browser like we do for images #8304
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Formatting on formula fields #6197
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Not able to directly set the display column as formula type #6150
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Formula Columns display decimal places incorrectly #6143
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Thumbnail generator for image uploaded #5207
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Manual reorganisation of project list #5055
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸš¥ Status: On Hold] ğŸ› Bug: CSV Upload does not strip % symbol out of % fields causing sort issues #4687
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: File / photo : upload via URL #4347
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: import excel throw error #3500
  • [ğŸ‘‹ For : Community or Good First Issue] ğŸ› Bug: GET request error #2664
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Extract Date from SingleLineText or DateTime column types #1134
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Attachment Previews and Embeds for More File Types #841
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Gray out not available column types instead of removing them from selection #822

What's Changed

  • fix: avoid conversion support for literal months by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9044
  • Nc fix/3368 links followup by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9051
  • fix(nc-gui): view page title udpate issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9056
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9050
  • fix: use original url if signed url not available by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9062
  • feat: allow preview for media types by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9052
  • fix: remove extra slash from path by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9066
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9064
  • feat: formula formatting support by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9048
  • fix: 'Create View' button appearing through sharing link of Base #9055 by @jonathanc-n in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9058
  • fix: attachment related issues by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9067
  • Nc feat: audit logs pagination keyboard shortcuts support by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9065
  • feat: attachments in browser by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8990
  • feat: groupby bulk apis by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9040
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9069
  • Nc fix/ssl prop related by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9071
  • fix[build-local-docker-image.sh]: pnpm i -> pnpm bootstrap. by @VergeDX in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9070
  • feat: thumbnail generator by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8974
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9074
  • chore: sync dependencies by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9075
  • Nc feat/3424 prefill links by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9077

New Contributors

  • @jonathanc-n made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9058
  • @VergeDX made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9070

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.251.2...0.251.3
